import { Meta, Story, Preview, Props } from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';
import { action } from '@storybook/addon-actions';

import Gallery from './Gallery';

<Meta title="Components/Gallery" />

# Gallery

## Single image

<Preview>
  <Story name="Gallery Single">
    <Gallery
      mask="dark"
      images={[
        {
          name: "sample.jpg",
          alt: "Alt Text",
          caption: "Single image",
          order: 0,
          fluid: {
            aspectRatio: 0.6666666666666666,
            base64: "data:image/jpeg;base64,",
            sizes: "(max-width: 2000px) 100vw, 2000px",
            src: "sample.jpg",
            srcSet: "sample.jpg 500w, sample.jpg 1000w, sample.jpg 2000w, sample.jpg 3000w, sample.jpg 3840w"
          },
          fixed: {
            base64: "data:image/jpeg;base64,",
            height: 900,
            src: "sample.jpg",
            srcSet: "sample.jpg 1x,sample.jpg 1.5x,sample.jpg 2x",
            width: 1400
          },
          resize: {}
        }
      ]}
    />
  </Story>
</Preview>

## Multiple images

<Preview>
  <Story name="Gallery Multiple">
    <Gallery
      mask="dark"
      images={[
        {
          name: "sample.jpg",
          alt: "Alt Text",
          caption: "A caption",
          order: 0,
          fluid: {
            aspectRatio: 0.6666666666666666,
            base64: "data:image/jpeg;base64,",
            sizes: "(max-width: 2000px) 100vw, 2000px",
            src: "sample.jpg",
            srcSet: "sample.jpg 500w, sample.jpg 1000w, sample.jpg 2000w, sample.jpg 3000w, sample.jpg 3840w"
          },
          fixed: {
            base64: "data:image/jpeg;base64,",
            height: 900,
            src: "sample.jpg",
            srcSet: "sample.jpg 1x,sample.jpg 1.5x,sample.jpg 2x",
            width: 1400
          },
          resize: {}
        },
        {
          name: "sample.jpg",
          alt: "Alt Text",
          caption: "Another imageâ€™s caption",
          order: 0,
          fluid: {
            aspectRatio: 0.6666666666666666,
            base64: "data:image/jpeg;base64,",
            sizes: "(max-width: 2000px) 100vw, 2000px",
            src: "sample.jpg",
            srcSet: "sample.jpg 500w, sample.jpg 1000w, sample.jpg 2000w, sample.jpg 3000w, sample.jpg 3840w"
          },
          fixed: {
            base64: "data:image/jpeg;base64,",
            height: 900,
            src: "sample.jpg",
            srcSet: "sample.jpg 1x,sample.jpg 1.5x,sample.jpg 2x",
            width: 1400
          },
          resize: {}
        }
      ]}
    />
  </Story>
</Preview>
